content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, I'm glad we're on the same page about the rental price. How much are you willing to pay for my apartment? Remember, I am looking for the highest possible price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my goal is to rent the apartment at the lowest price possible.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand, Mr. Abbasi. Since we have different goals in this negotiation, let's terminate this negotiation. Best of luck in your search.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
